reviews.review: I was totally blown away by this film. This movie has everything in it, from amazing acting, incredible action scenes and fantastic story telling. Infinity war is the best avengers hands down, the hero’s that are in here work perfectly together the Russo brothers deserve a huge award for this film!! I will see this movie a second time in theaters and I will buy it on blu Ray.
All though it left a bitter ending  the unpredictability did not disappoint. The action scenes is great and the visual editing is superb.

The best Marvel movie to date, fixes every problem that has been a staple of this universe so far, bad villain, fixed, no stakes/fear for our heroes lives, fixed, predictable ending, fixed. On ttop of that, its just a great, funny, action packed thrillride that was a blast to experience.
Too few characters to like in a long and what feels like they're trying too hard film
Action packed from the very beginning. Gasps and shock in the first 5 minutes. Can't wait for the next one.

This movie was amazing! I don't read comics so i went in just knowing the characters from previous films. And boy, did they do a good job of jumping between multiple story locations and characters without it feeling "too busy". And thanos actually gets some depth, rare for a VILLAIN in the genre.
Fantastic movie. Entertaining throughout. Lots of laughs and twists. If you’ve enjoyed ANY of the Marvel movies you’ll love this one too!!
Perfection. All the buildup paid off.

To those less invested, it can seem as if it drags on. To those who have waited 10 years for this experience, the only disappointment will be for lack of an even remotely happy ending. That being said, this is definitely worth a watch and it is pretty high on my list of top superhero flicks.

Good, not great. I was disappointed. Maybe its because i am a fan of the original comics and storylines and i know that scarlet witch is supposed to be essentially the most powerful being on earth and the Incredible Hulk as well..... This movie crippled characters in such ways it was painful to watch. The monologuing from Thanos i didnt fall asleep on although i did hear snores from others in the theater- the movie is very long. I dont want to say too much about the film so ill just say this: Go into the movie expecting a lot of action and suspense and a dash of comedy. Do not go into this film expecting accuracy or hope. Its a bit of a dream crusher. RIP to the fallen characters.
